description: It's finally time for Scott Finn to eat. Justin Matthews has listened to the public cries for someone to give Scott some vital nourishment, and he's decided he's just he man for the job. Scott protests, but Justin insists, and to prove his point, he force feeds Scott a long chunk of sausage, and makes sure that it makes it all the way down Scott's throat. But Scott has more than one hungry hole, it seems. Luckily Justin has the right remedy for all of Scott's insatiable needs, and he bends him over gives him all the attention he's so desperately requiring, and Scott's hungry holes are very appreciative.Enjoy!
title: Scott's Hungry Hole
